entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to a few flurries in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
